name_short.name: danger_name_short
name_short.response: I did not finish the request. The "name" was too short.

name_long.name: warning_name_long
name_long.response: The "name" was too long. If it was a mistake, delete it in the list.

name_longdelimiter.name: warning_name_long_multiple
name_longdelimiter.response: One of names in "names" was too long. If it was a mistake, delete it in the list. Maybe the "delimiter" was wrong?

name_notstring.name: danger_name_notstring
name_notstring.response: I did not finish the request. Somehow the "name" is not a string. How were you able to do that?

entries_notnumber.name: danger_entries_not_number
entries_notnumber.response: I did not finish the request. Somehow the "entries" is not a number. How were you able to do that?

entries_negative.name: danger_entries_negative
entries_negative.response: I did not finish the request. Input "entries" should be possitive number.

entries_large.name: danger_entries_large
entries_large.response: Are you sure "entries" were ok? That was pretty big number.

entries_largebutfofefa.name: danger_entries_largebutfofefa
entries_largebutfofefa.response: Isn't "entries" way too big? Oh wait, it was fofefa, then everything is alright.

entries_zero.name: warning_entries_zero
entries_zero.response: Input "entries" were zero, nothing happend. Why should it, right?
